Pairing Description 3: The wines rich fruit flavors and medium acidity cut through the richness of the goat cheese, while its minerality enhances the earthy sweetness of the caramelized onions and roasted vegetables.
Food & Wine Acidity 3: The wines medium acidity cuts through the richness of the goat cheese and caramelized onions, refreshing the palate.
Regional Pairing 3: This pairing nods to traditional Spanish pairings, where robust reds are often matched with savory, umami-rich flavors, like those found in roasted vegetables and goat cheese.
Sweetness & Spiciness 3: The dry finish of the wine allows the natural sweetness of the roasted vegetables to shine, while its subtle fruit flavors complement the caramelized onions without overpowering them.
